entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 3:30 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: N 41 km/h gust 60 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
